name: Amogus Tower Defense 2
description:
Sus Nation has been attacked and now all innocent Amoguses are being killed by ruthless invaders. It can't stay that way.
Commander Sus (It's you), everything is in your hands! 
Only you can lead your army to defend Sus Town and save the nation.

Good luck commander!

Disclaimer: If you find any bugs or have any ideas what can be changed or added, please let me know. Thanks
